name: Ruddle Battle PC
description:
A twist to the all time classic pong, with minimal graphics and lots of Physics !

You control your paddle like in classic pong, along with an additional control of turning it as a rudder - meet Ruddle !

So, you got bored with the arena ? Choose another one ! You get to play in any one of the four available arenas !

Your objective is simple, destroy your opponent's wall, until the ball gets through, and at the same time, defend your own wall behind you !

Controls

Its easy ! UP and DOWN arrow keys to move the Ruddle up and down, and use W and S keys to turn the top and the bottom of the ruddle towards the ball, respectively !
